mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is needed by just about every Minecraft mod today.

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Base common code for all chickenbones mods.

mod.name: Apache Commons Codec
mod.description: Apache Commons Codec (TM) software provides implementations of common encoders and decoders such as Base64, Hex, Phonetic and URLs.

mod.name: Apache Commons Compress
mod.description: The Apache Commons Compress library defines an API for working with ar, cpio, Unix dump, tar, zip, gzip, XZ, Pack200, bzip2, 7z, arj, lzma, snappy, DEFLATE and Z files.

mod.name: Forge Multipart
mod.description: Open source library for facilitation of multiple functional parts in the one block space.

mod.name: CoFHLib
mod.description: Library/API required by all CoFH mods. It's also meant as a resource for other modders!

mod.name: AnimationAPI
mod.description: Have you searched for hours and hours, looking for a way to properly animate your entities? Well look no further! The AnimationAPI is a mini-library that allows modders to (more) easily animate their entities.

mod.name: LiteLoader
mod.description: Installer for LiteLoader.

mod.name: HardLib
mod.description: Core library

mod.name: Bookshelf
mod.description: Bookshelf is a core/library mod, which adds new features and tools into the game for other content creators to work with. The primary focus of this project is to make use of the combined strength of the modded community to create wonderful tools that everyone can use.

mod.name: bspkrsCore
mod.description: Shared classes used in the mods maintained by bspkrs.

mod.name: Another One Bites The Dust
mod.description: AOBD dynamically finds all the ores and ingots added by any mod and makes them processable in IC2, EnderIO, RailCraft, Mekanism, Thermal Expansion, Thaumcraft, UltraTech, Factorization, RandomAdditions, Gany's Nether, Modular Systems, Hydraulicraft, Tinker's Construct, SimpleOreGrinder, RotaryCraft, Electrical Age, Aura Cascade, Flaxbeard's Steampower Mod, Engineer's Toolbox, and Immersive Engineering machines!

mod.name: AppleCore
mod.description: An API for modifying the food and hunger mechanics of Minecraft

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Base common code for all chickenbones mods.

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: Required for all CoFH Mods. Also provides some customization options for Minecraft.

mod.name: CoroUtil Library
mod.description: Collection of systems and helper code for Corosus's mods

mod.name: D3Core
mod.description: DoubleDoor Development Core

mod.name: DragonAPI
mod.description: My core library.

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO, EnderZoo, and others

mod.description: Shared library mod required by several of iChun's Mods.

mod.description: Core mod used for Opis

mod.name: MrTJPCore
mod.description: Core libs and utilities

mod.name: OpenMods

mod.description: Redstone enthusiasts' one-stop-shop. Compatibility module for Project Red.

mod.description: Redstone enthusiasts' one-stop-shop. Exploration module for Project Red.

mod.name: OpenEye
mod.description: User protection, error management and analytics

mod.name: Invasion mod
mod.description: So you think your base is tough do you?

mod.name: Harder Wildlife
mod.description: Trees grow, animals die and reproduce, seasons come and go, crops take more time to grow.

mod.name: Custom Ore Generation
mod.description: Allows the player to customize how ore is generated.

mod.name: Ore Flowers
mod.description: Adds ore indicator plants, allowing for easier prospecting of COG ore veins.

mod.name: Default Keyconfig
mod.description: A way for modpacks to ship a default key configuration without having to include an options.txt file.

mod.name: Hunger Overhaul
mod.description: Hunger mechanics overhauled

mod.name: Invasion mod
mod.description: So you think your base is tough do you?

mod.name: MineTweaker 3
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: Mob Properties
mod.description: Allows advanced customization options for all mobs' drops, attributes, and NBT data.

mod.name: Mod Tweaker 2
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for MineTweaker 3.

mod.name: RotaryCraft
mod.description: My tech mod, RotaryCraft.

mod.name: ElectriCraft
mod.description: An RC addon to make RC power easier to transport and store

mod.name: ReactorCraft
mod.description: A nuclear power RC addon.

mod.name: Survival Industry: Core
mod.description: The core mod of Survival Industry that adds relevant progression changes to the game

mod.name: Special AI
mod.description: Adds additional AI patterns to mobs to make the game more challenging. 'Passive' mobs will fight back, monsters will break light sources and wooden doors, some mobs gain random extra abilities, and villages are more... village-y.

mod.name: Zombie Awareness
mod.description: Smarter more aware zombies (and skeletons), they track you down via blood scent, sound, and light source awareness, config lets you pick and choose what features to have.

mod.name: Multi Mine
mod.description: pause and resume breaking, across players!

mod.name: MAtmos
mod.description: Adds context-sensitive atmospheric sounds to improve immersive play. Used with Minecraft Sound Improvement and Rhapsodia Resource Packs.

mod.name: Mine & Blade Battlegear 2 - Bullseye
mod.description: A WIP, open-source combat mod, focusing on groundbreaking features and balanced combat

mod.name: StartingInventory
mod.description: Allows you to define a list of items that will be given to the player when starting new worlds.

mod.name: Treecapitator
mod.description: (Industrial Stage) Allows you to chop down entire trees by breaking a single log.

mod.name: Advanced Genetics
mod.description: (Mad Science Stage) DNAo'matic!

mod.name: AgriCraft
mod.description: Agricultural farming extended

mod.name: Antique Atlas
mod.description: (Industrial Stage) Antique Atlas is a book that acts like a map featuring infinite scrolling, zoom and custom labeled markers. The map is generated around the player by calculating the average biome in each 16x16 chunk.

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: (Mad Science Stage) A Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world..

mod.name: AE2 Stuff
mod.description: (Mad Science Stage) Various Extensions for Applied Energistics 2

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware, fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables, enchanted plates, map frames, and seats!

mod.name: BiblioWoods Forestry Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 24 varietys of wood from Forestry for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: BuildCraft
mod.description: (Industrial Stage) Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mod.name: BuildCraft Compat
mod.description: (Industrial Stage) Compatibility add-on for BuildCraft

mod.name: BC Factory
mod.description: (Industrial Stage) Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more! (Factory Component)

mod.description: (Industrial Stage) Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more! (Builders Component)

mod.name: BC Transport
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more! (Transport Component)

mod.name: Logistics Pipes
mod.description: Logistics Pipes is an extensive overhaul of the Buildcraft pipe system. It allows for better distribution of items via pipes,...

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: A mod that adds in many fancy blocks for decoration, which are crafted utilising the Chisel.

mod.name: Crafting Tweaks
mod.description: Allows you to rotate or clear the crafting matrix by the press of a button, in any (supported) crafting window.

mod.name: Decocraft
mod.description: Adds 500+ models to decorate your Minecraft world.

mod.name: Dynamic Lights
mod.description: portable and moving lightsources

mod.name: Enchanting Plus
mod.description: Replaces the enchanting system with an optional custom one!

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: (Industrial Stage) Compact conduits, painted things and access to your stuff through an eye of ender.

mod.name: EnderStorage
mod.description: (Ender Tech Stage) Stores your stuff in the END! Credits: Ecu - original idea, design, chest and pouch texture; Rosethorns - tank model; Soaryn - tank texture; Supporters: Blkdragon112

mod.name: Ender Utilities
mod.description: (Ender Tech Stage) Some random, hopefully fun, and possibly even useful utilities (Modjam 4)

mod.name: EnhancedPortals
mod.description: (Mad Science Stage) An advanced technological portal teleportation system

mod.name: ExpandedRedstone
mod.description: A mod to greatly expand the power of vanilla redstone

mod.name: Extra Cells 2
mod.description: (Mad Science Stage) Adds new ME Storage Cells and some other cool stuff to AE 2.

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: Just a bunch of useful things

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: Fossils and Archeology Revival
mod.description: (Mad Science Stage) Adding dinosaurs, fossils, and more to Minecraft. If you have downloaded this mod from a source that is not Minecraft Forums or Curse, be aware you might be using an out of date or unofficial version.

mod.name: Garden Stuff
mod.description: Make your gardens and landscaping beautiful with multi-part plants, decorative planters, and more.

mod.name: GenDustry
mod.description: (Mad Science Stage) Adds industrial apiaries, advanced genetic manipulation and mutation (Forestry addon)

mod.name: Hunger In Peace
mod.description: Hunger and normal health regen in peaceful.

mod.name: INpureCore
mod.description: Core mod for all INpure mods

mod.name: JABBA
mod.description: Moar barrels The Jabba team would like to thank the Academy for this award... oh wait... *cough* erm... Credits to neptunepink for the original barrel idea, Q and his community for the name, special thanks to skyboy for rendering assistance and the DSU, and the many people whom have made modded MC such an awesome thing to be a part of.

mod.name: Minechem
mod.description: (Mad Science Stage) A mod based on chemicals and doing neat things with them

mod.name: MrCrayfish's Furniture Mod
mod.description: This mod adds in over 40 unique pieces of furniture for you to decorate your house with.

mod.name: Natural Absorption
mod.description: Provides the player with a regenerating shield, intended for play with no health regen (or very slow regen). Also can be configured to replace armor's damage reduction with absorption.

mod.name: NotEnoughItems
mod.description: Recipe Viewer, Inventory Manager, Item Spawner, Cheats and more

mod.name: NEI Addons
mod.description: Addons for Not Enough Items for various mods

mod.name: NEI Integration
mod.description: NEI handlers for all of the mods, one at a time.

mod.name: NotEnoughKeys
mod.description: Upddated Version of Okushama's NotEnoughKeys. Sorts the Controls gui system and adds optional modifiers (SHIFT, CTRL, ALT) to keys.

mod.name: OpenBlocks
mod.description: All the things you never thought you will ever need

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.authors: Florian 'Sangar' Nuecke,Johannes 'Lord Joda' Lohrer,Everyone who contributed to the mod on Github - thank you!
mod.description: (Industrial Stage) This mod adds modular computers and robots that can be programmed in Lua.

mod.name: Pam's HarvestCraft
mod.description: An absolutely huge farming and food mod.

mod.name: Pam's Weee! Flowers
mod.description: This mod adds fourteen new flowers, allows you to farm those flowers (plus yellow and red MC flowers), and make decorative fl...

mod.name: ProjectRed Illumination
mod.description: Redstone enthusiasts' one-stop-shop. Illumination module for Project Red.

mod.name: Railcraft
mod.description: (Industrial Stage) Redefine your rails

mod.name: RFTools
mod.description: (Mad Science Stage) RedFlux tools

mod.description: Adds a chisel to the game that is made of flintstone.

mod.name: Survival Industry: Igniter
mod.description: (Industrial Stage) Igniter block independent of Tinker's Mechworks

mod.name: Small Boats
mod.description: Usable craft that have animated parts, working chests, and can carry multiple passengers. Boats include the Elegant Punt, the Whitehall, and the Hoy.

mod.name: Somnia
mod.description: Somnia simulates the world while you sleep.

mod.name: Sound Filters
mod.description: Adds reveb to caves, as well as muted sounds underwater/in lava, and behind walls.

mod.name: The Spice of Life
mod.description: Encourages dietary variety through diminishing returns.

mod.name: Stalker Creepers
mod.description: Creepers will stalk you. That means, not explode or announce their presence until you turn around.

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Storage Drawers: Forestry Pack
mod.description: Adds additional wood styles from the Forestry mod.

mod.name: Sync
mod.description: (Mad Science Stage) Sync mod, made for ModJam 3. Allows multiple player instances.

mod.name: Tool Utilities
mod.description: Utilities for your tools! 3 by 3 mining, block placement, and more!

mod.name: TorchTools
mod.description: Place torches with a right click of your pick

mod.name: The Vegan Option
mod.description: Adds vegan alternatives for the various animal products used in Minecraft.

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: All your data are belong to us.

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: An add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at

mod.name: WAILA Plugins
mod.description: WAILA plugins for various mods, such as Blood Magic, Magical Crops, and Forestry!

mod.name: Ztones
mod.description: Decorative Blocks

mod.name: BetterStorage
mod.description: Adds more storage related blocks and items to the game.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod.

mod.name: Survival Industry Resources
mod.description: (Resource Pack) Contains branding for and various miscellaneous resources for the Survival Industry modpack.

mod.name: Rhapsodia Resource Pack
mod.description: (Resource Pack) Atmosphere sound effects pack for Minecraft. Used with MAtmos.

mod.name: Sn0wSong Sound Effects Pack
mod.description: (Resource Pack) Sound resource pack to improve game experience.

mod.name: Minecraft Sound Improvement Resource Pack
mod.description: (Resource Pack) Sound resource pack to improve game experience. Used with MAtmos.

mod.name: Incompetech Music Pack
mod.description: (Resource Pack) A custom resource pack that makes use of Incompetech music.

mod.name: Mapwriting Mods
mod.description: If you want an in-game map with overlays, waypoints, and other features, you'll find one here.

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore.

mod.name: JourneyMap Server
mod.description: Server-Side control for JourneyMap Features

mod.name: VoxelMap
mod.description: Minimap and Worldmap. Have an overview of your surroundings, or view the entire world. Create waypoints.

mod.name: Player Option
mod.description: These mods are meant to provide extra features or mechanics to the game, either to add variety or to make some tasks easier.

mod.name: ProjectRed Transmission
mod.description: Redstone enthusiasts' one-stop-shop. Integration and Transmission modules for Project Red.

mod.name: TerritoryZone
mod.description: A territory demarcation and enforcement utility

mod.name: Sn0wSong Music Pack
mod.description: (Resource Pack) Replacement music for both in-game, and environmental game music.

mod.name: Refined Relocation
mod.description: (Industrial Stage) Filter, sort and relocate!

mod.name: [SBM] Wooden Buckets
mod.description: Simple mod that adds a few wooden buckets for early game fluid transport

mod.name: World Generation
mod.description: Mods that add new things to the world on startup.

mod.name: Mo' Villages
mod.description: A mod that makes villages more common and spawn in more biomes

mod.name: Alternate Terrain Generation
mod.description: ATG provides an alternative to vanilla terrain generation.

mod.name: Climate Control
mod.description: Climate Zone Size Reducer

mod.name: Nether Ores
mod.description: Introduces mineable yet dangerous ores to the Nether

mod.name: Realistic Terrain Generation
mod.description: Adds a new world type which generates realistic terrain for Overworld biomes.

mod.name: Roguelike Dungeons
mod.description: Adds randomized dungeons to the world

mod.name: Ruins (Structure Spawning System)
mod.description: A structure spawning system

mod.name: Hardcore Mods
mod.description: These mods are meant to make the game even harder.

mod.name: Mutant Creatures
mod.description: (Browser Download) Giant versions of the vanilla minecraft mobs to deal with. Includes mutant enderman, skeleton, zombie, creeper, snow golem, and pig.

mod.name: Special Mobs
mod.description: Adds variants to the vanilla mobs to make them more interesting and challenging.

mod.name: Infernal Mobs
mod.description: Diablo Style random Enchantments on Entities! Harder fights! More XP and enchanted loot!

mod.name: HarderUnderground
mod.description: Stone no longer floats and other hazards of the underground spaces.

mod.name: EnviroMine
mod.description: Adds more realism to Minecraft with environmental effects, physics, gases and a cave dimension.

mod.name: Iguana Tweaks
mod.description: Various tweaks for vanilla

mod.name: Performance Tweaks
mod.description: These mods provide tweaks to the game to theoretically improve performance. Results are NOT guaranteed by Survival Industry.

mod.name: OptiFine Light
mod.description: (Browser Download) This mod adds support for HD textures and a lot of options for better looks and performance.

mod.name: OptiFine HD Standard
mod.description: (Browser Download) This mod adds support for HD textures and a lot of options for better looks and performance.

mod.name: OptiFine HD Ultra
mod.description: (Browser Download) This mod adds support for HD textures and a lot of options for better looks and performance.

mod.name: BetterFps
mod.description: Performance Improvements

mod.name: FastCraft
mod.description: This pack contains Fastcraft, by Player, disabled by default. Fastcraft enhances Minecraft with increased performance. If FastCraft is enabled, bug reports being made directly to Mod Authors should state Fastcraft is enabled.
